text.main: Numbers here are indicating the maximum per category which the company is allowed to share based on their privacy policy - which you have accepted when you use their services or visited their german website.
gaugeExplanation.third: Average value from all company information currently available in this category
gaugeExplanation.fourth: Highest value for a single company, based on currently available company information
text.average: Shows the average value in this category from all currently available company information.
text.total: Shows the highest value of a company in this category from the currently available company information.
